option.title: <Text_Preset_7>WEDDING</Text_Preset_7>
option.info:
Click here to visit

Lauren Lenitni's clients describe her wedding photography style as having a "journalistic approach wth fine art details". Using her artistic style combined with documnetary consistency to tell the most beautiful story in the most honest and creative way possible. FAQ: WHAT IS YOUR APPROACH TO PHOTOGRAPHING WEDDINGS; CAN YOU DESCRIBE YOUR STYLE? I photograph each wedding as if I am telling a story. There is a beginning, a middle, and an end. My ultimate goal is to capture personalities, emotion, and the joy of the day without the subject even being aware of the camera. A wedding photographer should sense and anticipate moments all without speaking or changing the scene. Wedding images should reflect the couple, event, and guest in the purest form. WHAT ABOUT FORMAL GROUP PHOTOGRAPHS? Wedding coverage would not be complete without exceptional group photography for the sake of family history. Formal group photographs include the couple, wedding party, parents, immediate family members and are quickly and masterfully created, often in a session lasting less than 15 minutes. DO YOU SHOOT ON FILM OR DIGITALLY? I shoot only digitally. I have found this to be the most consistant medium as well as providing my studio enormous creative oportunites through the digital development process. DO YOU HAVE A CREW TO PHOTOGRAPH THE WEDDING? No. My style is very unobtrusive. I prefer to work on my own to lessen the sense of intrusion. Having more than 1 photographer at the wedding tends to interfere with the "normality and comfort" of the subjects and distracts from the natural course and purety of acquiring candid shots. HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE FOR THE UM-MARKED PROOFS & DVD'S TO BE DELIVERED? About three weeks following the date of the event. HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE FOR THE ALBUMS TO BE PRINTED AFTER THE IMAGES ARE CHOSEN? Once the couple has chosen the album and the format, it takes about 4 weeks for printing and 2 additional weeks for my studio to finish and send out the layout. In total it takes about 2 months for the album ot be completed and delivered. ARE THE PHOTOS FROM THE WEDDING OURS TO KEEP? Yes! All images selected from the weeding are provided to the client on DVD. ARE YOU FULLY INSURED? Yes. I have full liability insurance coverage, often required for large venues. Proof of Coverage will be provided on request. CAN I PAY WITH A CREDIT CARD? Yes. I also accept personal checks provided they have been recieved within 10 businesss days of the wedding. CAN I PAY IN INSTALLMENTS? Yes. For local weddings, I will accept a $1500 deposit upon booking your event. 1/2 of the remaining balance is due 10 business days prior to the wedding day. The last remaining balance is due upon receipt of the proofs. DO YOU PROVIDE THANK YOU CARDS FROM THE IMAGES? Yes. For $375 I can make 250 white cards with a color or black & white image of the couple's choice on the front with a message written on the inside. We can also provide postcards with a simular layout. Envelopes are included. IS THERE A TIME LIMIT FOR THE WEDDING CEREMONY? On average, I shoot for 8 hours (not including travel time). There is a $350 per hour charge for each hour beyond 8 hours. For smaller weddings, pricing may be negotiated based on the date and season. DO YOU SHOOT ENGAGEMENT PORTRAITS? Of course! This is the best opportunity to get to know my clients and for the couple to feel more at ease with the photography process.

option.title: <Text_Preset_7>LICENSING</Text_Preset_7>
option.introText: <Text_Preset_9>Many of the images on this site are available for licensing. We can also customize images for special request. Please contact us with licensing inquiries.</Text_Preset_9>
option.info:
Click here to contact

Limited edition signed and numbered original prints are reproduced to the finest standards available for photographic imagery. The fine art prints are individually supervised by the artist and are available as eight-color pigmented inks on heavyweight archival papers or metallic coupler prints. In some cases, other substrates are also available. Non-edition prints are available for custom art installations. Our art design services can assist interior designers, architects, and art consultants with small to large-scale projects. Please contact us with licensing inquiries.
